full_text: Longer meetings, shorter breaks in between virtual meetings, and other responsibilities such as childcare could be leaving women more bleary-eyed than men https://t.co/Wf9rpIdQqa

localize.full_text: 長時間の会議、バーチャルな会議の間の短い休憩、育児などの他の責任により、女性は男性よりも目が冴えている可能性があります。https://t.co/Wf9rpIdQqa
